document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 93-15
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON DETE MUNG AND DECLARING THE NEED FOR A REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY TO FUNCTION IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AND DECLARING THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON TO BE TBE REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY
